subject: Sports Injuries
Football
lead_paragraph: Linebacker Jon Beason, one of the Giants’ defensive leaders, sustained a ligament tear and a small fracture in his right foot that may jeopardize his availability for the season opener.
snippet: Linebacker Jon Beason, one of the Giants’ defensive leaders, sustained a ligament tear and a small fracture in his right foot that may jeopardize his availability for the season opener.
